title: Chess Academy
des: Chess Academy offers comprehensive chess courses for players of all levels. Whether you're a complete beginner or an advanced player looking to refine your strategies, our expert instructors will guide you through the exciting world of chess. Join us and enhance your chess skills to master the game on and off the board.

courses.course_description: It's a beginner level class for chess Academy.
It's an intermediate level class for chess Academy
It's an advanced level class for chess Academy

title: Shogi's Academy
des: Shogi's Academy, located in the vibrant city of Coimbatore, specializes in the art of Shogi, the Japanese variant of chess. Immerse yourself in the intricacies of Shogi with our range of courses, from the basics to advanced tactics and strategies. Unleash your strategic prowess and elevate your Shogi skills with us!

courses.course_description: Basic introduction to the game of Shogi
Advanced tactics and strategies in Shogi

title: ND Academy
des: Shikamaru Academy, situated in the bustling city of Tokyo, is dedicated to honing strategic thinking skills. Our courses focus on developing a sharp and analytical mindset. Join us to master the art of strategic thinking and leadership, preparing yourself for success in any field.

title: Senseicademy
des: Asuma's Senseicademy, located in the Hidden Leaf Village, is your gateway to mastering the art of Shogi. Dive into our courses, including 'Guess the King' and 'Protect the King,' and unravel the mysteries of strategic gameplay. Join us on this exciting journey and discover the true essence of Shogi!

courses.course_description: Master the art of Shogi's and find the true King!!!!
Learn more strategic skills and surpass the hokage!!
